description: A vulnerability was identified in Tipray 厦门天锐科技股份有限公司 Data Leakage Prevention System 天锐数据泄露防护系统 1.0. This affects the function findRolePage of the file findSingConfigPage.do. The manipulation of the argument sort leads to sql injection. The attack is possible to be carried out remotely. The exploit is publicly available and might be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.

product.name: Data Leakage Prevention System 天锐数据泄露防护系统

vendor.name: Tipray 厦门天锐科技股份有限公司
